snippet: Growing pleas for help from local residents affected by flooding have prompted an uncharacteristic response: a grass-roots aid effort spearheaded by young activists mostly in Moscow.
abstract: Growing pleas for help from local residents affected by flooding have prompted an uncharacteristic response: a grass-roots aid effort spearheaded by young activists mostly in Moscow.

headline.main: Amid Devastation, Russians Heed Pleas for Aid
